FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Hood dent, buckle, or visible deformation
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Structural damage may affect engine compartment protection and resale value
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Hood replacement or professional dent repair

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Front bumper crack, separation, or missing pieces
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Compromised impact protection, possible sensor/camera damage
Reduced visibility and safety, electrical hazard if water enters

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Front fender dent, scrape, or misalignment
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Panel gaps may allow water intrusion, paint damage leads to rust
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Fender repair or replacement with paint matching

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Radiator visible through grille, coolant leak present
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Engine overheating risk, vehicle may be undriveable
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Radiator replacement and cooling system inspection

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Paint transfer from another vehicle visible
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Indicates collision severity, may hide deeper damage
Reduced airflow to engine, debris entry risk
Structural integrity compromised, may affect vehicle safety and alignment
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Frame straightening or vehicle may be total loss

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Airbag deployment indicators (dashboard warning, steering wheel deformation)
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Airbag system replacement and diagnostic reset

FRONT_END_COLLISION.cue: Front wheel misalignment or tire damage
FRONT_END_COLLISION.risk: Alignment and suspension damage affects handling and tire wear
FRONT_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Wheel alignment, suspension inspection, possible replacement

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Trunk/boot dent, buckle, or won't close properly
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Structural damage, water intrusion risk, trunk mechanism damage
REAR_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Trunk panel repair or replacement, latch adjustment

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Rear bumper crack, separation, or pushed inward
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Reduced rear impact protection, sensor damage (parking sensors/cameras)

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Taillight cracked, shattered, or lens missing
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Reduced visibility to other drivers, water damage to electrical components

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Rear quarter panel dent or scrape
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Paint damage leads to rust, affects vehicle appearance and value
REAR_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Panel beating, filler work, and repainting

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Exhaust pipe bent, hanging, or damaged
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Exhaust leak, loud noise, emissions failure, fire hazard
Security risk, water intrusion, visibility impairment

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Rear suspension sagging or visible damage
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Handling and ride quality affected, alignment issues

REAR_END_COLLISION.cue: Fuel tank or fuel lines visible damage
REAR_END_COLLISION.risk: Fuel leak creates fire hazard and environmental concern
REAR_END_COLLISION.repair_action: Fuel system repair, immediate safety inspection required

SIDE_IMPACT.cue: Door dent, crease, or won't open/close properly
SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Door mechanism damage, safety latch failure, water intrusion
SIDE_IMPACT.repair_action: Door panel repair or replacement, mechanism adjustment

SIDE_IMPACT.cue: Side mirror cracked, broken, or hanging
SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Reduced visibility, illegal to drive, electrical damage if powered
Security risk, water entry, flying glass hazard
Structural weakness, rust risk, affects vehicle rigidity
SIDE_IMPACT.repair_action: Panel repair or replacement with rust protection

SIDE_IMPACT.cue: Wheel rim bent, cracked, or tire sidewall damage
SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Tire blowout risk, vibration, alignment issues

SIDE_IMPACT.cue: B-pillar or door frame visible damage
SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Critical structural damage, occupant safety compromised
SIDE_IMPACT.repair_action: Structural assessment required, possible total loss

SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Significant side impact, airbag replacement needed
SIDE_IMPACT.repair_action: Side airbag replacement and system reset

SIDE_IMPACT.risk: Rust will develop quickly if not treated
SIDE_IMPACT.repair_action: Surface preparation and repainting with rust treatment

PARKING_DAMAGE.cue: Minor bumper scrape or scuff marks
PARKING_DAMAGE.repair_action: Buffing, touch-up paint, or bumper refinishing

PARKING_DAMAGE.cue: Door edge dent from adjacent car door
PARKING_DAMAGE.risk: Paint chipping leads to rust, cosmetic defect
PARKING_DAMAGE.repair_action: Paintless dent repair (PDR) or minor panel work

PARKING_DAMAGE.cue: Scratches on fender or quarter panel
PARKING_DAMAGE.risk: Surface damage may expose primer or metal
Sensor malfunction, parking assistance system disabled

PARKING_DAMAGE.cue: Rear camera lens cracked or obscured
PARKING_DAMAGE.risk: Reduced rearward visibility, safety feature disabled

WINDSHIELD_DAMAGE.cue: Small chip or star crack (less than 2cm)
WINDSHIELD_DAMAGE.risk: Crack may spread due to temperature changes or vibration
WINDSHIELD_DAMAGE.repair_action: Resin injection repair if within repairable zone

WINDSHIELD_DAMAGE.risk: Structural integrity compromised, vision obstruction, illegal

WINDSHIELD_DAMAGE.cue: Multiple impact points or bullseye cracks
Crack in driver's line of sight
Windshield delamination or haze between layers

UNDERCARRIAGE_DAMAGE.cue: Oil pan scrape or dent with leak
UNDERCARRIAGE_DAMAGE.risk: Oil loss leads to engine damage, environmental hazard
UNDERCARRIAGE_DAMAGE.repair_action: Oil pan replacement, engine oil refill

UNDERCARRIAGE_DAMAGE.risk: Transmission fluid loss, potential transmission failure
Exhaust leak, loud noise, emissions failure
Handling affected, alignment issues, unsafe driving
